name: Burg_317
culture_notes: Speaks Riveric Dialect with Coastal Tongue loanwords
Tide and ancestor rituals shape daily schedule
Diet heavy on smoked fish and kelp preserves
Low literacy focused on navigation and ritual calendars
constraints: Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
Long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
notes: Population undocumented; transient river traffic dominates
Strategic ferry node for inland trade; modest built infrastructure
